root: ^Ossaneth: Sharp, isnâ€™t it? But a knife is only as good as the one who wields it.

KNIFE_SILENT: ^Ossaneth: Not afraid, are you? Or just... thoughtful?
^[You pull away slowly. The wounds on your hand do not heal.]
KNIFE_PULL_BACK: ^[You pull away as if burned. The wounds on your hand instantly heal.]
^Ossaneth: Hah. You still have boundaries. Admirable.
KNIFE_GRIP: ^[Your hand, slick with blood, closes around the hilt. It feels... right.]
^Ossaneth: Be warned - even the best swordsman can still get cut by his own knife.
^[You reluctantly pull your hand away. The blood dries, but doesn't disappear.]
